You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENHANCE YOUR CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE WITH SALESFORCE FEEDBACK MANAGEMENT
Create a Data Map to Get Alerts

Create a data map to receive record alerts for survey responses when defined conditions are met. For example, service agents can view alerts related to survey responses with negative customer feedback.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Available with the Feedback Management - Starter or Feedback Management - Growth licenses, and IndustriesServiceExcellenceAddOn and FSCAlertFramework


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create or update data maps:	
Create and send survey permissions
Read and Create permissions for the objects whose records the data map creates or updates
Read and Create permissions for fields that the data map creates or updates
Read permission for records with mapped ID

To view data maps:	Read permission for the Survey object
From the App Launcher, find and select Surveys.
Click New.
Enter a name for the survey, and then select Standard Survey.
Edit the Welcome page.
Add a page, and then enter the Rating type question as Rate your recent experience with our support team.
Edit the survey’s Thank You page, and then save the survey.
In the Survey Builder, click Advanced Settings, and then select Merge Field Variables.
Click Object Variables for Merge Fields.
In Participant Object, enter the Variable Name as ContactName.
For Object, select Contact, and then save your changes.
Click Back to Builder, and then click Advanced Settings.
Click Survey Data Mapping, and then click New Mapping.
Name the mapping.
In Action Type, select Create Record.
From the Target Object dropdown, select Record Alert.
Define these target objects and values.
FIELD	INFORMATION TYPE	VALUE
Effective Start Date	Date/Time	14 April 2023
Valid Until Date	Date/Time	30 April 2023
What Record ID	Participant Record	Contact ID
Active	Boolean	True
Parent Record ID	Associated Record ID	Case
Subject	String	Low CSAT Score
Select Based on conditions, and then specify these values.
Select Conditions: All conditions are met
Logic Type: Response to Question
Question: Rate your recent experience with our support team
Operator: is less than
Response: 4
Save the mapping and the survey.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Configure Salesforce Feedback Management Alerts
